tasks.title: Gather stakeholder requirements
tasks.description: Meet with marketing, sales, and product teams to collect requirements for the new website design.

tasks.title: Create wireframes
tasks.description: Design low-fidelity wireframes for homepage, product pages, and checkout flow.

tasks.title: Design system setup
tasks.description: Establish color palette, typography, spacing, and component library in Figma.

tasks.title: Homepage development
tasks.description: Build responsive homepage with hero section, featured products, and testimonials.

tasks.title: Mobile optimization
tasks.description: Ensure all pages are fully responsive and optimized for mobile devices.

tasks.title: Performance audit
tasks.description: Run Lighthouse tests and optimize Core Web Vitals scores.

tasks.title: Pull sales data from CRM
tasks.description: Export Q1 sales figures, conversion rates, and pipeline data from Salesforce.

tasks.title: Analyze marketing ROI
tasks.description: Calculate return on investment for each marketing channel and campaign.

tasks.title: Create executive summary
tasks.description: Write 2-page summary highlighting key wins, challenges, and recommendations.

tasks.title: Build presentation deck
tasks.description: Create PowerPoint with charts, graphs, and talking points for board meeting.

tasks.title: Prepare workstation
tasks.description: Set up laptop, monitors, keyboard, and request necessary software licenses.

tasks.title: Create onboarding checklist
tasks.description: Document all steps for first week including HR paperwork, team intros, and training sessions.

tasks.title: Schedule intro meetings
tasks.description: Book 30-min intro calls with each team member and key stakeholders.

tasks.title: Assign first project
tasks.description: Identify a small starter project to help new hire get familiar with codebase.

tasks.title: Fix login timeout issue
tasks.description: Users are being logged out after 5 minutes. Investigate session management.

tasks.title: Resolve payment gateway error
tasks.description: Some transactions failing with error code 503. Check Stripe integration.

tasks.title: Fix email notification delays
tasks.description: Order confirmation emails taking 10+ minutes to send. Review queue system.

tasks.title: Address memory leak in dashboard
tasks.description: Dashboard page consuming excessive memory after prolonged use.

tasks.title: Complete AWS certification course
tasks.description: Finish remaining modules for AWS Solutions Architect Associate exam.

tasks.title: Read 'Clean Code' book
tasks.description: Finish chapters 10-17 and take notes on key principles.

tasks.title: Attend team tech talk
tasks.description: Join Friday's presentation on microservices architecture.
